title: How to Azir???
body: He seems really weak, whenever I try and make OP plays with him the enemy just abuses their no-skill burst damage and kills me instantly, should I stay on the path of learning Azir or jump on the burst noob bandwagon??? Because at the moment it seems that Azir is only good for his ult and I don't like that.

replies.body:
>no skill burst damage

Mad because bad.

> [{quoted}](name=Antodara,realm=NA,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=PdkKWAZN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-11T10:05:51.568+0000)
>
> Mad because bad.

Lol GET BACK TO NA MATEY! you aint gonna be able to handle this community ;l

Azir is extremely good once you master him. Just keep learning and watching youtube videos, good luck!

A basic combo is W > E and Q midway to where you want to dash to. Once you master this combo you can walljump 2 walls at once and you can add an auto + R into it for a killing combo. GL bro!
W > E > Q doesn't work for me, I always reach my soldier before i can fire Q out.
